review: I found Amazon Fire TV easy to use and so addictive - I feel like there is no reason to have cable now.
author: Got to be safe

review: It was very easy to hook up and works great for Amazon Prime movies.
author: Rhonna E

review: Wonderful device.  My son and I love it.
author: yandie

review: The device is greatI'd give it 5 stars if Amazon wasn't locking down the device so much though preventing you from doing anything 'fun' with it
author: Tyghe Vallard

review: 5 stars all the way!!! Money well spent on the Fire TV! We loved it so much, we ended up getting another one for the other room :)

review: I'm very disappointed in it the device works but the movies n tv doesn't it's stsrts playing then freezes or blank screen only sound

review: I love the Fire TV! If you have a prime membership then this is well worth getting. So many new movies you can watch from home!! Goodbye redbox!!
